question: Which among the following was NOT a reason behind India’s poverty as pointed out by Dadabhai Naoroji in his famous work “Poverty and Un-British Rule in India” ?
option1: Expenditure of the European Officials in England
option2: Money sent by the British professionals to England
option4: Bringing of British Capital in India
explanation: In his work, Dadabhai did not accept that the Indian poverty was due to over population or the interplay of some economic laws as publicized by the British.
